entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Am I crazy? Or did anyone else just hear #Trump say, "The power of the president [regarding the subject we're talking about]...is total!"

This #COVID19 #PressBriefing is a disaster! Get that new press secretary from #FoxyNews Kaylee McDonald'sHackANanny [sic] out there STAT!
